description: Need dinner in a hurry? This speedy BBQ style pork recipe will be on the table in 15 minutes. Tender pork is served with greens for a delicious crunch.
name: BBQ pork, rice & greens bowls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 560 g Woolworths COOK slow cooked Chinese BBQ style pork with char siu sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Heat rice according to packet instructions. Shred pork, then divide rice, pork and greens among bowls. Drizzle with reserved sauce and serve scattered with chilli and onion.
Heat rice according to packet instructions. Shred pork, then divide rice, pork and greens among bowls. Drizzle with reserved sauce and serve scattered with chilli and onion.
